001package edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.gradebook;
002
003import edu.pdx.cs410J.ParserException;
004import org.junit.jupiter.api.Test;
005import org.w3c.dom.Document;
006
007import javax.xml.transform.TransformerException;
008import java.io.ByteArrayInputStream;
009import java.io.IOException;
010import java.io.InputStream;
011import java.time.LocalDateTime;
012
013import static edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.gradebook.Assignment.ProjectType.*;
014import static edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.gradebook.GradeBook.LetterGradeRanges;
015import static edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.gradebook.GradeBook.LetterGradeRanges.LetterGradeRange;
016import static org.hamcrest.MatcherAssert.assertThat;
017import static org.hamcrest.Matchers.*;
018
019public class GradeBookXmlTest {
020
021  @Test
022  public void letterGradeRangesArePersistedToXml() throws IOException, TransformerException, ParserException {
023    GradeBook book = new GradeBook("test");
024
025    LetterGradeRanges undergradRanges = book.getLetterGradeRanges(Student.Section.UNDERGRADUATE);
026    morphLetterGradeRanges(undergradRanges, 1);
027
028    LetterGradeRanges gradRanges = book.getLetterGradeRanges(Student.Section.GRADUATE);
029    morphLetterGradeRanges(gradRanges, 2);
030
031    GradeBook book2 = writeAndReadGradeBookAsXml(book);
032
033    LetterGradeRanges undergradRanges2 = book2.getLetterGradeRanges(Student.Section.UNDERGRADUATE);
034    assertRangesAreEqual(undergradRanges, undergradRanges2);
035
036    LetterGradeRanges gradRanges2 = book2.getLetterGradeRanges(Student.Section.GRADUATE);
037    assertRangesAreEqual(gradRanges, gradRanges2);
038  }
039
040  private void assertRangesAreEqual(LetterGradeRanges ranges, LetterGradeRanges ranges2) {
041    for (LetterGrade letterGrade : LetterGrade.values()) {
042      LetterGradeRange range = ranges.getRange(letterGrade);
043      if (range == null) {
044        continue;
045      }
046      LetterGradeRange range2 = ranges2.getRange(letterGrade);
047      assertThat("Range for " + letterGrade, range2.minimum(), equalTo(range.minimum()));
048    }
049  }
050
051  private void morphLetterGradeRanges(LetterGradeRanges ranges, int morphValue) {
052    for (LetterGrade letterGrade : LetterGrade.values()) {
053      LetterGradeRange range = ranges.getRange(letterGrade);
054      if (range == null) {
055        continue;
056      }
057      range.setRange(range.minimum() + morphValue, range.maximum() + morphValue);
058    }
059    LetterGradeRange fRange = ranges.getRange(LetterGrade.F);
060    fRange.setRange(0, fRange.maximum());
061  }
062
063  private GradeBook writeAndReadGradeBookAsXml(GradeBook book) throws IOException, TransformerException, ParserException {
064    Document doc = XmlDumper.dumpGradeBook(book, new XmlHelper());
065    byte[] bytes = XmlHelper.getBytesForXmlDocument(doc);
066
067//    System.out.println(new String(bytes));
068
069    XmlGradeBookParser parser = new XmlGradeBookParser(new ByteArrayInputStream(bytes));
070    return parser.parse();
071  }
072
073  @Test
074  public void dueDatesArePersistedToXml() throws TransformerException, IOException, ParserException {
075    GradeBook book = new GradeBook("test");
076    String assignmentName = "assignment";
077    Assignment assignment = new Assignment(assignmentName, 10.0);
078    book.addAssignment(assignment);
079
080    LocalDateTime dueDate = LocalDateTime.now().minusDays(3).withNano(0);
081    assignment.setDueDate(dueDate);
082
083    GradeBook book2 = writeAndReadGradeBookAsXml(book);
084
085    assertThat(book2.getAssignment(assignmentName).getDueDate(), equalTo(dueDate));
086  }
087
088  @Test
089  public void poaAssignmentsArePersistedToXml() throws TransformerException, IOException, ParserException {
090    GradeBook book = new GradeBook("test");
091    String assignmentName = "assignment";
092    Assignment assignment = new Assignment(assignmentName, 10.0);
093    assignment.setType(Assignment.AssignmentType.POA);
094    book.addAssignment(assignment);
095
096    GradeBook book2 = writeAndReadGradeBookAsXml(book);
097
098    assertThat(book2.getAssignment(assignmentName).getType(), equalTo(Assignment.AssignmentType.POA));
099  }
100
101  @Test
102  public void xmlHasNewlinesButNotIndentation() throws TransformerException, IOException {
103    GradeBook book = new GradeBook("test");
104    Document doc = XmlDumper.dumpGradeBook(book, new XmlHelper());;
105    byte[] bytes = XmlHelper.getBytesForXmlDocument(doc);
106    String string = new String(bytes);
107    assertThat(string, containsString("\n"));
108    assertThat(string.chars().filter(c -> '\n' == c).count(), greaterThan(4L));
109    assertThat(string, not(containsString(" <")));
110  }
111
112  @Test
113  void sectionNamesArePersistedToXml() throws ParserException, IOException, TransformerException {
114    String undergraduate = "Undergraduate Section";
115    String graduate = "Graduate Section";
116    GradeBook book = new GradeBook("test");
117    book.setSectionName(Student.Section.UNDERGRADUATE, undergraduate);
118    book.setSectionName(Student.Section.GRADUATE, graduate);
119
120    GradeBook book2 = writeAndReadGradeBookAsXml(book);
121
122    assertThat(book2.getSectionName(Student.Section.UNDERGRADUATE), equalTo(undergraduate));
123    assertThat(book2.getSectionName(Student.Section.GRADUATE), equalTo(graduate));
124  }
125
126  @Test
127  void assignmentCanvasIdsArePersistedToXml() throws ParserException, IOException, TransformerException {
128    String name = "Assignment";
129    double points = 1.34;
130    int canvasId = 12345;
131
132    GradeBook book = new GradeBook("test");
133    book.addAssignment(new Assignment(name, points).setCanvasId(canvasId));
134
135    GradeBook book2 = writeAndReadGradeBookAsXml(book);
136    Assignment assignment = book2.getAssignment(name);
137
138    assertThat(assignment.getName(), equalTo(name));
139    assertThat(assignment.getPoints(), equalTo(points));
140    assertThat(assignment.getCanvasId(), equalTo(canvasId));
141  }
142
143  @Test
144  void canParseGradebookWithoutAssignmentCanvasIds() throws ParserException {
145    InputStream stream = getClass().getResourceAsStream("gradebookWithoutAssignmentCanvasIds.xml");
146    GradeBook book = new XmlGradeBookParser(stream).parse();
147    assertThat(book, notNullValue());
148  }
149
150  @Test
151  void projectTypesArePersistedToXml() throws ParserException, IOException, TransformerException {
152    Assignment.ProjectType projectType = APP_CLASSES;
153    persistProjectOfType(projectType);
154  }
155
156  private void persistProjectOfType(Assignment.ProjectType projectType) throws IOException, TransformerException, ParserException {
157    GradeBook book = new GradeBook("test");
158    String projectName = "appClasses";
159    Assignment appClasses = new Assignment(projectName, 1.0).setProjectType(projectType);
160    book.addAssignment(appClasses);
161
162    GradeBook book2 = writeAndReadGradeBookAsXml(book);
163
164    assertThat(book2.getAssignment(projectName).getProjectType(), equalTo(projectType));
165  }
166
167  @Test
168  void textFileProjectTypeIsPersistedToXml() throws ParserException, IOException, TransformerException {
169    persistProjectOfType(TEXT_FILE);
170  }
171
172  @Test
173  void prettyPrintProjectTypeIsPersistedToXml() throws ParserException, IOException, TransformerException {
174    persistProjectOfType(PRETTY_PRINT);
175  }
176
177  @Test
178  void xmlProjectTypeIsPersistedToXml() throws ParserException, IOException, TransformerException {
179    persistProjectOfType(XML);
180  }
181
182  @Test
183  void restProjectTypeIsPersistedToXml() throws ParserException, IOException, TransformerException {
184    persistProjectOfType(REST);
185  }
186
187  @Test
188  void androidProjectTypeIsPersistedToXml() throws ParserException, IOException, TransformerException {
189    persistProjectOfType(ANDROID);
190  }
191
192  @Test
193  void canParseGradeBookWithoutProjectType() throws ParserException {
194    InputStream stream = getClass().getResourceAsStream("gradebookWithoutProjectTypes.xml");
195    GradeBook book = new XmlGradeBookParser(stream).parse();
196    assertThat(book, notNullValue());
197  }
198
199}
